headline: 3 Dividend-Paying Artificial Intelligence Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: Artificial intelligence has been a hot market throughout 2024.  AI fueled the surge in share price for companies such as Nvidia, which saw its stock rise nearly 180% over the past year through Dec. 31.  A great way to capitalize on the AI boom is to invest in companies that are not only involved in artificial intelligence, but also pay a robust, dependable dividend.
